attributes.additional_details:
I propose that we have a national Remembrance Day for the victims of child abuse.  We remember the fallen who fought for their country, we should also remember the innocent children who suffer, or have fallen in the face of the most horrific abuse; those who fight for their own existence when they should not have to do so.

This should be a celebration, a solum reminder, and a clear message that we do not tolerate child abuse in the United Kingdom.
